Episodes.Title: Captain
Episodes.Plot: The submarine "USS Colorado" receives orders to fire nuclear weapons at Pakistan. When the Captain and XO demand confirmation, the Colorado crew are declared rogue enemies of their own country.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Matt Gerald, Omid Abtahi, Max Adler, David Rees Snell, Michael Ng, Jessica Camacho, Will Rothhaar, Bruce Davison

Episodes.Title: Blue on Blue
Episodes.Plot: More than 20 warships close in on the Colorado. As Kendal is forced into a battle on the ground, Prosser questions Marcus' judgement.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jay Hernandez, Jay Karnes, Michael Ng, Omid Abtahi, John Prosky, Assaf Cohen, Jenny Cooper, Ilia Volok, Chad Michael Collins

Episodes.Title: Eight Bells
Episodes.Plot: A search for missing crew members leads to Serrat's compound and an ominous demand. A clandestine meeting between Kylie and Admiral Shepard confirms that the fire order came through a back channel.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jay Karnes, Jessica Camacho, Will Rothhaar, Michael Gaston, April Grace, Michael Ng, Chad Michael Collins, Carlos Leal, Tyler Tuione, Bruce Davison

Episodes.Title: Voluntold
Episodes.Plot: Even as Marcus and Sam learn that they have been charged with treason against the United States, a greater threat within their own crew is brewing. Meanwhile, an old friend of Sam's, Paul Wells, pays Christine a visit and tries to ease her fears about her husband.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jay Karnes, Jessica Camacho, Will Rothhaar, Michael Gaston, David Rees Snell, Michael Mosley, Michael Ng, Bruce Davison, Jay Hernandez

Episodes.Title: Skeleton Crew
Episodes.Plot: In an attempt to end the standoff on Sainte Marina, Marcus and Sam enter into tense negotiations with the U.S. Government. Meanwhile, when a critical system fails, Grace must take command of the Colorado on a perilous repair operation.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jay Karnes, April Grace, Omid Abtahi, Michael Ng, Bruce Davison, Jay Hernandez

Episodes.Title: Another Fine Navy Day
Episodes.Plot: The crew is hit with an attack by an unknown force unlike anything they?ve seen before. As confusion and aggression take hold, Marcus and Sam can no longer trust their own senses even as they race to save the sub and defend the island.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Gideon Emery, Omid Abtahi, David Rees Snell, Jessica Camacho, Michael Ng, Jay Hernandez

Episodes.Title: Nuke it Out
Episodes.Plot: As Marcus and Sam hunt for the traitor in their ranks who stole their nuclear launch key, Prosser disobeys orders and starts a small war he can?t control. Meanwhile Grace and James must work together to defuse a dangerous situation, as back in D.C. Christine is indicted as Sam's co-conspirator.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jay Karnes, Gideon Emery, Jessica Camacho, Will Rothhaar, David Rees Snell, Adrian LaTourelle, Martha Hackett, Jay Hernandez

Episodes.Title: Big Chicken Dinner
Episodes.Plot: Marcus brings the islanders and the members of the Colorado together for a feast in the spirit of Thanksgiving; Grace searches for the truth when an essential crew member is accused of a crime.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jay Karnes, Gideon Emery, Jessica Camacho, Michael Mosley, Michael Ng, Tyler Tuione, Jay Hernandez

Episodes.Title: Cinderella Liberty
Episodes.Plot: The crew waits for a visit from its families; Marcus must contemplate the unthinkable; the reason for the attack on Pakistan is revealed.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jay Karnes, Jessica Camacho, Michael Gaston, David Rees Snell, Cas Anvar, Shaun Toub, Nazneen Contractor, Sam Page, Mitchell Fink, Jay Hernandez

Episodes.Title: Blue Water
Episodes.Plot: Sam and James depart the island in a daring rescue attempt. Back on the island of Sainte Marina, a Chinese diplomat arrives to make a deal with Marcus. With scarcity and a prison problem plaguing him, Marcus finds himself treading down a more treacherous path than he could have imagined.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Episodes.GuestStars: Jason Beghe, Chin Han, David Rees Snell, Will Rothhaar

Episodes.Title: Damn the Torpedoes
Episodes.Plot: A typhoon, a mutiny and a Washington coup d'etat will force Marcus and his crew into unlikely alliances. As Sam's grief strains his loyalty to Marcus, will Sainte Marina get the supplies it so desperately needs? How far will Marcus go to ensure the crew's survival -- will it cost him his life?
Episodes.GuestStars: Jason Beghe, Chin Han, David Rees Snell, Will Rothhaar

Episodes.Title: The Pointy End of the Spear
Episodes.Plot: Kylie works with Admiral Shepard to bring down the President, using evidence of what really happened in Pakistan. This affords Marcus the opportunity to surrender the Colorado, if all goes according to plan. Meanwhile, Speaker of the House Conrad Buell, meets with a small group of Washington heavyweights to discuss the unthinkable when Kylie?s video information helps persuade him to participate in a risky and treasonous maneuver.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Jessica Camacho, Michael Gaston, Ernie Hudson, Will Rothhaar, Michael Mosley, Chin Han, Michael Ng, Bruce Davison

Episodes.Title: Controlled Flight Into Terrain
Episodes.Plot: In the exciting series finale, a violent battle for control erupts on the submarine, which leaves the Colorado vulnerable to capture by a third party ? one with an exploitative plan. Can Marcus and Sam take control of the sub before it?s too late?
Episodes.GuestStars: Will Rothhaar, Jessica Camacho, Michael Mosley, David Rees Snell, Michael Gaston, Jason Beghe, Chin Han, Michael Ng
